title: International Pancakes ◎ ☰ ⟁ ⊞ ◎ ☰ ⟁ ⊞
description: Don't be fooled: every culinary culture has pancakes. You know that chain pancake place over by the highway? They claim to be 'International', but they only offer us French Toast and Belgian Waffles. What other international delights are they keeping from us?
